sc.api.plugins

Interface IGameInstance

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RoundBasedGameInstance

    public interface IGameInstance

      • onPlayerJoined

        SimplePlayer onPlayerJoined()
                     throws TooManyPlayersException
        XXX can be unique for GamePlugin, adds-player-to-game has to work for imported gameState too
        Returns:
        SimpleClient
        Throws:
        TooManyPlayersException - Thrown when already enough player

      • onPlayerLeft

        void onPlayerLeft(SimplePlayer player)

      • onAction

        void onAction(SimplePlayer fromPlayer,
              ProtocolMessage data)
       throws GameLogicException,
              InvalidGameStateException
        Called by the Server once an action was received.
        Parameters:
        fromPlayer - The player who invoked this action.
        data - The plugin-secific data.
        Throws:
        GameLogicException - if any invalid action is done, i.e. game rule violation
        InvalidGameStateException

      • addGameListener

        void addGameListener(IGameListener listener)
        Extends the set of listeners.
        Parameters:
        listener - GameListener to be added

      • removeGameListener

        void removeGameListener(IGameListener listener)

      • start

        void start()
        Server or an administrator requests the game to start now.

      • destroy

        void destroy()
        At any time this method might be invoked by the server. Any open handles should be removed. No events should be sent out (GameOver etc) after this method has been called.

      • loadFromFile

        void loadFromFile(java.lang.String file)
        The game is requested to load itself from a file (the board i.e.). This is like a replay but with actual clients.
        Parameters:
        file - File where the game should be loaded from

      • loadFromFile

        void loadFromFile(java.lang.String file,
                  int turn)
        The game is requested to load itself from a file (the board i.e.). This is like a replay but with actual clients. Turn is used to specify the turn to load from replay (e.g. if more than one gameState in replay)
        Parameters:
        file - File where the game should be loaded from
        turn - The turn to load

      • loadGameInfo

        void loadGameInfo(java.lang.Object gameInfo)
        The game is requested to load itself from a given game information object (could be a board instance for example)
        Parameters:
        gameInfo - the stored gameInformation

      • getWinners

        java.util.List<SimplePlayer> getWinners()
        Returns the players that have won the game, empty if the game has no winners, or null if the game has not finished.
        Returns:
        List of SimplePlayers, which won the game

      • getPluginUUID

        java.lang.String getPluginUUID()
        Returns pluginUUID. Only used for generating replay name.
        Returns:
        uuid of plugin

      • getPlayers

        java.util.List<SimplePlayer> getPlayers()
        Returns all players. This should always be 2 and the startplayer should be first in the List.
        Returns:
        List of all players

      • getPlayerScores

        java.util.List<PlayerScore> getPlayerScores()
        Returns the PlayerScore for both players
        Returns:
        List of PlayerScores
